overview: Irreverent city engineer Behzad comes to a rural Kurdish village in Iran to keep vigil for a dying relative. In the meanwhile the film follows his efforts to fit in with the local community and how he changes his own attitudes as a result.
cast: Behzad Dorani|Farzad Sohrabi|Noghre Asadi|Roushan Karam Elmi|Bahman Ghobadi
